data.description:
Power Force is designed for enjoying casual shooting with slight challenging and thrilling moments.

We are not meant to make this a professional shooting game which needs a lot of tactics and strategic thinking.  Instead, It is an easy-to-play FPS game with many different enemies.  What players need to do is "Just shoot" !

# Features
1. Two modes  with 3 levels each to play: There are different settings of challenges in arcade and classic modes. It suits for wide range of players who can always  find a mode and level to enjoy ! 

2. Shoot like Keanu Reeves with dual guns!
Pistol, gatlin, missile,  and shotgun. Each weapon brings you to a unique experience.

3. Roguelike Gameplay
Establish multiple strategies to going through the battlefield with random props and buffs!

4. Relieve pressure and get sweaty
Dodge bullets by moving body up to down, left to right. Watch out for the bullets! Be agile! 

Join Discord to share your opinions:
https://discord.gg/kXyVkxaVHu

changelog.change_log: V1.0.7c Release Note: 1. Fixed the problem of UI being non-interactable occasionally. 2. Fixed the problem of randomly switching weapon when use swing to switch weapon. 3. Fixed the problem of pointer being blocked or color being messed up when selecting props.

V1.0.7b Release Note:
1. Fixed abnormal situations when getting back to the game after pause.
2. Optimize the effect of boss.
3. In Stage 5, you can pass directly after clearing the boss without clearing the wing crafts.
4. Added effect after applying recovering / time freezing in game.
5. Optimized user interface of roguelite content, making it easier to select.

V1.0.7 Release Note:
1. Added release note panel, recording the information of each update
2. Added a new space scene that appears from stage 6
3. Optimized the boss, making it more challenging
4. Optimized the gatlin, making it da-da-da-dah longer
5. Optimized the power-up buttons to be triggered after long-press, to prevent from selecting by accident
6. Dubbing added, Weapons & Props' selection UI optimized
